001package com.github.sormuras.bach;
002
003import java.lang.module.ModuleDescriptor.Version;
004import java.util.LinkedList;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Optional;
007
008/** Options. */
009public record Options(
010    MainOptions forMain,
011    ConfigurationOptions forConfiguration,
012    ProjectOptions forProject,
013    List<String> unhandledArguments) {
014
015  /** A group of optional components used by the main program. */
016  public record MainOptions(Optional<Boolean> help, Optional<Boolean> version) {}
017
018  /** A group of optional components used as global settings of a {@link Configuration} instance. */
019  public record ConfigurationOptions(
020      Optional<Boolean> verbose, Optional<Boolean> lenient, Optional<Integer> timeout) {}
021
022  /** A group of optional components used when building a project model instance. */
023  public record ProjectOptions(Optional<String> name, Optional<Version> version) {}
024
025  /** Parses an array of strings in command-line style into an options instance. */
026  public static Options parse(String... args) {
027    Boolean help = null;
028    Boolean version = null;
029    Boolean verbose = null;
030    Boolean lenient = null;
031    Integer timeout = null;
032    String projectName = null;
033    Version projectVersion = null;
034    var unhandled = new LinkedList<String>();
035    var arguments = new LinkedList<>(List.of(args));
036    while (!arguments.isEmpty()) {
037      var argument = arguments.pop();
038      switch (argument) {
039        case "--help", "/?" -> help = true;
040        case "--version" -> version = true;
041        case "--verbose" -> verbose = true;
042        case "--lenient" -> lenient = true;
043        case "--timeout" -> timeout = Integer.parseInt(arguments.pop());
044        case "--project-name" -> projectName = arguments.pop();
045        case "--project-version" -> projectVersion = Version.parse(arguments.pop());
046        default -> unhandled.add(argument);
047      }
048    }
049    return new Options(
050        new MainOptions(Optional.ofNullable(help), Optional.ofNullable(version)),
051        new ConfigurationOptions(
052            Optional.ofNullable(verbose),
053            Optional.ofNullable(lenient),
054            Optional.ofNullable(timeout)),
055        new ProjectOptions(Optional.ofNullable(projectName), Optional.ofNullable(projectVersion)),
056        List.copyOf(unhandled));
057  }
058}
